short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your user experience on Youtube

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Youtube Master enhances your user experiences on Youtube.

Features:
★ Sort videos on the home page.
★ Sort related videos when watching a video.
★ Hide a video from the home page.
★ Hide an entire channel from the home page.
★ Control video playing speed.
★ Control volume by mouse wheel.
★ Darken the background when watching a video.
★ Take a screenshot of the video you are watching.
★ Hide related videos when watching a video.
★ Hide comments when watching a video.
